item.description:
Color Me Mine "Thirsty Thursday" Ladies Night Out!"

At the Color Me Mine Store in the Mashpee Commons!

You can bring in the wine/champagne, and the studio provides appetizers for $10.00 per person.

For an additional $15-25 you get to choose the ceramic piece. Paints, supplies, glazing and firing are included.

How it works

Choose your ceramic piece.
They have over 400 to choose from.

Sketch your original design with a pencil.
Or choose graphics from their design computer. Over 25,000 ideas!

Select your underglazes. 50 colors to choose from!

Paint it however you like. Check out our Color Me Mine technique sheets for painting ideas.

They fire in the kilns for you on premises.

Take home a GJWHF Keepsake!
item.how_to_find_us: It won't be hard to find us! I'll have on my name tag!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Dish, Dine, Food & Wine at Color Me Mine "Thirsty Thursday" Ladies Night Out!
